definition: Zhongzhan district of Jiaozuo city 焦作市[Jiao1 zuo4 shi4], Henan
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website
Zhongzhan district of Jiaozuo city 焦作市[Jiao1 zuo4 shi4], Henan

sentences.english: Flat clappers made of bone or wood originally used by the end man in a minstrel show.
sentences.chinese: 打拍者巡遊演出中站在一端敲擊骨制或木製響板的人。

sentences.english: In virtue Hong banyan the proportion that stood in all tree kinds biggest.
sentences.chinese: 在德宏榕樹在所有樹種中站的比重最大。

sentences.english: Then in the main aisle of the Court there rose a youthful advocate.
sentences.chinese: 這時，法庭的主通道中站起一位年輕的律師。

sentences.english: Frank sided with David in the argument.
sentences.chinese: 弗蘭克在爭論中站在戴維一邊。

sentences.english: We stood and panted for a moment in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 我們在黑暗中站着喘息了一會。

sentences.english: Side lobes are generally the largest among the minor lobes.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，旁瓣在副瓣中站的比例量是最大的。

definition: to get up on hind legs (esp. of horse)/to stand/to spring up
to lend an arm to support sb
to crawl/to climb/to get up or sit up
to gain a firm foothold/(fig.) to get oneself established
pleasant to the eye/Taiwan pr. [zhong4 kan4]
to leave (a room etc)/to go out through (a door etc)
